## Problem / Проблема

A clear description of the problem this feature would solve.

Example: "I'm always frustrated when..."

## Proposed Solution / Предлагаемое решение

A clear description of what you want to happen.

## Alternatives Considered / Рассмотренные альтернативы

Any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

## Use Case / Сценарий использования

Who would benefit from this feature and how?

## Additional Context / Дополнительный контекст

Any other context, screenshots, or examples.

## Checklist / Чеклист

- [ ] I have searched existing issues to ensure this hasn't been requested
- [ ] This feature would benefit most users (not just my specific use case)
- [ ] This feature aligns with the project's goals (system maintenance)
